'CÃ©sar Milstein', FRS (8 October 1927 – 24 March 2002) was an
Argentine biochemist in the field of antibody
research. Milstein shared
the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine in 1984 with Niels Kaj Jerne and
Georges J. F. KÃ¶hler.
